remarks: Function mapping a set to the class of all associative (closed internal binary) operations for this set, see definition 5 in [BourbakiAlg1] p. 4, where it is called "an associative law of composition". (Contributed by AV, 20-Jan-2020.)
statement:
df-assintop $p |- assIntOp = ( m e. _V |-> { o e. ( clIntOp ` m ) | o assLaw m } ) $.
$d m o $.
